title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.30 - Corrosive liquids referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.30 - Corrosive liquids referenced to this section

State Regulations

Corrosive liquids listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of one gallon or 20
pounds gross weight. There are no restrictions on the transport of empty
containers which last contained such corrosive liquid provided the accompanying
shipping papers show them to be empty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
